description: Unbeknownst to Trent Diesel, Parker London is a parolee working in a doctor's office as a clerk. Trent is late for his physical examination and Parker decides to do the job. Parker perv over Trent's body. Trent confronts Parker and says he will report this weird physical. Parker takes Trent down and binds him in leather straps. Trent endures electricity to his balls and hole while he's being edged for hours. Parker beats the boy and fucks him on his boss's desk.
title: Dr Parker London and His Unwilling Patient
